transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Hi, is this Zhi? Hi, this is Arjun calling from MongoDB. Have I caught you at a good time?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Uh, yeah, hi, this is Zhi—I've got about five minutes. What’s up?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Great, thanks—I’ll be quick. I saw that Acme Corp just rolled out some AI features. Congrats on the launch! How’s that transition going?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Oh, thanks. Yeah, it’s, uh, definitely been a push. We’re still ironing out a few things, but overall it’s exciting.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Awesome. The reason for my call—I noticed you’re currently running MongoDB on-prem. A lot of fintechs are moving to Atlas for managed scalability, especially once AI workloads kick in. Have you considered cloud?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: We’ve thought about it, honestly. But… migration is scary. Uptime is huge for us. And, uh, compliance. Not sure we want to mess with what’s working.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, totally hear you—especially in fintech. Just curious, are your on-prem clusters handling the increased load since the AI rollout? Any pain points there?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Hmm, we’re holding steady, but traffic is spikier now. Monitoring is, uh, more stressful.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: That makes sense. Atlas automates scaling and has built-in monitoring, which can take those manual headaches off your plate. And with compliance—we’re PCI DSS and SOC2 certified.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: That’s good to know. But honestly, contracts and vendor lock-in worry me. And what if migration goes sideways? We can’t afford downtime.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely fair. We have flexible contract options and our migration team has helped hundreds of fintechs—many with zero downtime. Would a case study or technical doc help you understand what that looks like?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, I’d love to see something concrete. Could you send that over, maybe with contract details too?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Definitely. I’ll send a short email after this with a link to a fintech migration story and a breakdown of Atlas contract options. Best address for you is zhi@acmecorp.com?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yep, that’ll work. Thanks, Arjun. Please keep it brief, though—I’m swamped.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Of course, I’ll keep it short and to the point. Really appreciate your time, Zhi. Have a good one!
